synopsis.text: Kagaku, a young student from the 25th century, and Alisa, a girl from the 30th century, embark on a thrilling journey through time, witnessing pivotal moments in human history and religion. As they navigate through the annals of time, they encounter legendary figures such as Hermes, Moses, Shakyamuni Buddha, Jesus Christ, and the revered Chinese monk Chih-i. Through these encounters, they uncover profound truths about the interconnectedness of humanity and the gods hidden in our past. As they traverse the temporal landscape, Satoru and Alisa discover not only the secrets of transcending time and space but also the power of true love and courage. Join these two intrepid teenagers as they 'time-raft' through history, unveiling the mysteries that bind us all in the grand tapestry of time.
